nodes.text: Chewie and the Courageous Kid is a young-readers storybook that adapts issues 1–3 of the comic book miniseries Star Wars: Chewbacca. The book was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on April 17, 2018. It was later republished as part of the young-reader story collection Galactic Adventures Storybook Collection on October 2, 2018, where it was titled "Chewbacca and the Courageous Kid."

A Wookiee is a girl's best friend! When Chewbacca meets young Zarro on and [sic] Outer Rim planet, he has no choice but to set aside his own mission to help her rescue her father from a dangerous mine.
